name: MandarinNumbers
0:
”Alexa open Mandarin Numbers”
”Alexa ask Mandarin Numbers for a number”
”Alexa ask Mandarin Numbers for a random number”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mandarin numbers
des:
Learn numbers in Mandarin Chinese.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Mandarin Numbers" or "Alexa, open Mandarin Numbers" to get a number.

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
